mapper.insert: insert into t_meta (mid, name, slug, type, contentType, description, sort, parentId) values (#{mid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{slug,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contenttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_meta set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, slug = #{slug,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contentType = #{contenttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parentId = #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where mid = #{mid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select mid, name, slug, type, contentType, description, sort, parentId from t_meta
